[center]Welcome to
MannyGT's Mods

[size=10]SALMON SHACK[/size]

[img]http://s22.postimg.org/lg6dn3hht/titolo.jpg[/img]

[youtube]kiEDdb0b0_s[/youtube][youtube]-xQqXnj45wk[/youtube]

[color=yellow]======= * TWO WORDS FROM ME - PLEASE READ, THANK YOU! * =======[/color][/center]
Hello to all you, to all my friends, to all my Facebook followers, to who donated my some money
and to all that had endorsed any of my previous mods.
This mod will be surely the LAST MOD I release!
Yes, after over 1 and half year, I want to retire myself from Skyrim modding because I'm tired.
So enjoy all my mods a thing about this shack as my tiny home in Skyrim :)
I'll support you as usual but not at the same frequency (sometime I insta-replied to you).

Last words: THANK YOU VERY MUCH TO ALL, THE CREATION KIT WAS A VERY GOOD AND FINE EXPERIENCE FOR ME BUT NOW IS TIME TO GO AWAY.

It's time to make a backup and uninstall Skyrim...
Kind regards!



* DESCRIPTION *
No tons of mannequins,
no tons of mounting weapon plaques,
no rack weapons...

This is just a shack, the Salmon Shack! It's located near the Solitude Sawmill, in the tiny island.
It's a perfect hut for who play Skyrim in inmmersion mode and for who like to be an adventurer. It's near the cart of Solitude,
so no matter for who don't use fast travel, and of course is near Solitude to buy foods and other things.
Since there are some NPCs near the shack, the foods inside it will respawns as usual in exterior places (call this as "lore").
However there is a safe chest (the only one!)

* INSTALLATION *
Just unpack the rar and put the ESP into data folder. Enable in your Skyrim launcher and enjoy.

* UNINSTALLATION *
First off, take back all your things from the safe chest (if you did it).
Then simply remove the ESP file.

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod is your friend, free from scripts and there are no mods conflicts. Works fine together my Lanterns of Skyrim mod.

* FACEBOOK *
I'm on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods
author: MannyGT
